Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Writer: Henry Gayden, Chris Morgan, Bill Parker
Actors: Zachary Levi, Asher Angel, Jack Dylan Grazer
Plot: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!", is transformed into his adult superhero alter ego, Shazam.
Country: United States, Germany, New Zealand, United Kingdom, India, South Korea, Canada
